root.name: Alien Hallway
root.description: OverviewAlien Hallway is an Action/Strategy game that was developed and published by Sigma Team for the PC platform. Command a team of soldiers and destroy the green aliens coming in hordes for you!On August 19, 2011 Alien Hallway was released on Steam for $9.99.PC System RequirementsOS: Windows 7/Vista/XPProcessor: 1.6 GHzMemory: 1GBHard Disk Space: 100MB of free spaceVideo Card: 128 MB DirectX 9.0c compatible or better video card with pixelshader 2.0DirectXÂ®: 9.0cSound: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound cardAdditional: Microsoft XNA Framework 3.1
